snippet: The Hall of Fame infielder Paul Molitor, 58, was given a three-year deal to replace Ron Gardenhire, who was fired five weeks ago.
abstract: Hall of Fame infielder Paul Molitor is hired as the Minnesota Twins manager and is given a three-year deal to replace Ron Gardenhire.
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame infielder Paul Molitor, 58, was given a three-year deal to replace Ron Gardenhire, who was fired five weeks ago.

headline.main: Paul Molitor Is Hired to Manage the Twins
